thread.title: Trump briefing materials included allegations of Russia ties: Sources
thread.title_full: Trump briefing materials included allegations of Russia ties: Sources

title: Trump briefing materials included allegations of Russia ties: Sources
text:
Trump briefing materials included allegations of Russia ties: Sources Ken Dilanian SHARES Joe Raedle | Getty Images Donald Trump speaks during a campaign rally at the Collier County Fairgrounds on October 23, 2016 in Naples, Florida. 
Two U.S. officials with direct knowledge told NBC News on Tuesday that briefing materials prepared for President-elect Trump included information that initially circulated among Trump opponents and was passed to U.S. intelligence agencies making damaging allegations about his dealings with Russians. 
Neither of the officials said that the FBI was actively investigating the information, which has not been verified by U.S. agencies. 
The sources would not comment on the nature of the allegations. The Trump transition team did not immediately respond to a request for comment.
